gotham_middleware_diesel/
lib.rs

1//! Provides an interface for running Diesel queries in a Gotham application.
2//!
3//! The gotham diesel middleware uses [tokio::task::spawn_blocking], which allows
4//! blocking operations to run without blocking the tokio reactor. Although not true async,
5//! this allows multiple concurrent database requests to be handled, with a default of 100
6//! concurrent blocking operations.
7//!
8//! Usage example:
9//!
10//! ```rust
11//! # use diesel::{RunQueryDsl, SqliteConnection};
12//! # use diesel::sql_types::Int8;
13//! # use futures_util::FutureExt;
14//! # use gotham::router::Router;
15//! # use gotham::router::builder::*;
16//! # use gotham::pipeline::*;
17//! # use gotham::state::{FromState, State};
18//! # use gotham::helpers::http::response::create_response;
19//! # use gotham::handler::HandlerFuture;
20//! # use gotham_middleware_diesel::{self, DieselMiddleware};
21//! # use gotham::hyper::StatusCode;
22//! # use gotham::test::TestServer;
23//! # use gotham::mime::TEXT_PLAIN;
24//! # use std::pin::Pin;
25//!
26//! pub type Repo = gotham_middleware_diesel::Repo<SqliteConnection>;
27//!
28//! fn router() -> Router {
29//!     // Create a Repo - using an in memory Sqlite DB
30//!     let repo = Repo::new(":memory:");
31//!     // Add the diesel middleware to a new pipeline
32//!     let (chain, pipeline) =
33//!         single_pipeline(new_pipeline().add(DieselMiddleware::new(repo)).build());
34//!
35//!     // Build the router
36//!     build_router(chain, pipeline, |route| {
37//!         route.get("/").to(handler);
38//!     })
39//! }
40//!
41//! fn handler(state: State) -> Pin<Box<HandlerFuture>> {
42//!     let repo = Repo::borrow_from(&state).clone();
43//!     // As an example, we perform the query:
44//!     // `SELECT 1`
45//!     async move {
46//!         let result = repo
47//!             .run(move |mut conn| {
48//!                 diesel::select(diesel::dsl::sql::<Int8>("1"))
49//!                     .load::<i64>(&mut conn)
50//!                     .map(|v| v.into_iter().next().expect("no results"))
51//!             })
52//!             .await;
53//!         match result {
54//!             Ok(n) => {
55//!                 let body = format!("result: {}", n);
56//!                 let res = create_response(&state, StatusCode::OK, TEXT_PLAIN, body);
57//!                 Ok((state, res))
58//!             }
59//!             Err(e) => Err((state, e.into())),
60//!         }
61//!     }
62//!     .boxed()
63//! }
64//!
65//! # fn main() {
66//! #    let test_server = TestServer::new(router()).unwrap();
67//! #    let response = test_server
68//! #        .client()
69//! #        .get("https://example.com/")
70//! #        .perform()
71//! #        .unwrap();
72//! #    assert_eq!(response.status(), StatusCode::OK);
73//! #    let body = response.read_utf8_body().unwrap();
74//! #    assert_eq!(&body, "result: 1");
75//! # }
76//! ```
77#![doc(test(no_crate_inject, attr(allow(unused_variables), deny(warnings))))]
78
79use diesel::r2d2::R2D2Connection;
80use futures_util::future::{self, FutureExt, TryFutureExt};
81use log::{error, trace};
82use std::panic::{catch_unwind, AssertUnwindSafe};
83use std::pin::Pin;
84use std::process;
85
86use gotham::handler::HandlerFuture;
87use gotham::middleware::Middleware;
88use gotham::prelude::*;
89use gotham::state::{request_id, State};
90
91mod repo;
92pub use repo::Repo;
93
94/// A Gotham compatible Middleware that manages a pool of Diesel connections via a `Repo` and hands
95/// out connections to other Middleware and Handlers that require them via the Gotham `State`
96/// mechanism.
97#[derive(NewMiddleware)]
98pub struct DieselMiddleware<T>
99where
100    T: R2D2Connection + 'static,
101{
102    repo: AssertUnwindSafe<Repo<T>>,
103}
104
105impl<T> DieselMiddleware<T>
106where
107    T: R2D2Connection,
108{
109    pub fn new(repo: Repo<T>) -> Self {
110        DieselMiddleware {
111            repo: AssertUnwindSafe(repo),
112        }
113    }
114}
115
116impl<T> Clone for DieselMiddleware<T>
117where
118    T: R2D2Connection + 'static,
119{
120    fn clone(&self) -> Self {
121        match catch_unwind(|| self.repo.clone()) {
122            Ok(repo) => DieselMiddleware {
123                repo: AssertUnwindSafe(repo),
124            },
125            Err(_) => {
126                error!("PANIC: r2d2::Pool::clone caused a panic");
127                process::abort()
128            }
129        }
130    }
131}
132
133impl<T> Middleware for DieselMiddleware<T>
134where
135    T: R2D2Connection + 'static,
136{
137    fn call<Chain>(self, mut state: State, chain: Chain) -> Pin<Box<HandlerFuture>>
138    where
139        Chain: FnOnce(State) -> Pin<Box<HandlerFuture>> + 'static,
140        Self: Sized,
141    {
142        trace!("[{}] pre chain", request_id(&state));
143        state.put(self.repo.clone());
144
145        let f = chain(state).and_then(move |(state, response)| {
146            {
147                trace!("[{}] post chain", request_id(&state));
148            }
149            future::ok((state, response))
150        });
151        f.boxed()
152    }
153}
